Richard Woon Tian JunLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 17 Mar 2019Costs will kill you over time, always make sure to make cost-efficient investment decisions. Money that you don't get due to these costs is money you lose!0 comments0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 26 Feb 2019Dont invest in things that you dont understand at all and do your research first.0 comments0
